highlights: Record data center revenue driven by Hopper compute, HGX systems, networking
Blackwell sampling, H200 ramp, spectrum of next-gen platforms (H200, B200, NIM microservices)

notes: Exciting launches: ACE digital humans, Project G-Assist, 600 AI-enabled RTX apps, 2,000 GeForce NOW titles
Omniverse digital twin accelerations, USD NIM microservices, automotive/robotics verticals
NVIDIA DRIVE platform, robotics customers (Boston Dynamics, BYD, Siemens) and automotive AI applications

capital_expenditure.context: Partial capex for AI infrastructure (PP&E + intangibles)

product_innovation: Blackwell sampling, H200 shipments, MBG 200 NVL72 NVLink domain (72 GPUs)
Spectrum-X Ethernet for AI, integrated with OEMs/OEMs, plus NIM microservices, AI Foundry with Llama 3.1
software: AI Enterprise run rate ~ $2B, NIM Agent Blueprints for enterprise, software run rate increasing
Omniverse Cloud expansions for Mercedes-Benz and manufacturing digital twins
sovereign_and_enterprise: Sovereign AI builds (Japan ABCI 3.0) with H200 + Quantum-2
Enterprise AI adoption (Amdocs, ServiceNow, SAP, Snowflake, Cohesity)

metadata.source: NVDA Q2 FY2025 press release & transcript
